content:
Kaspi Bank - Q1 2024 Financial Statement

BALANCE SHEET HIGHLIGHTS:
- Total Assets: 8200.00 billion KZT (growth: 0.0% YTD)
- Loans Portfolio: 5136.90 billion KZT (62.6% of total assets)
- Customer Deposits: 6395.43 billion KZT (78.0% of total assets)

INCOME STATEMENT:
- Net Profit: 190.76 billion KZT
- Return on Equity (ROE): 19.39%
- Return on Assets (ROA): 2.33%
- Net Interest Margin: 4.50%

CAPITAL & RISK METRICS:
- Capital Adequacy Ratio: 18.97% (Basel III requirement: 12.5%)
- Tier 1 Capital Ratio: 16.05%
- Non-Performing Loans (NPL) Ratio: 4.00%
- Loan Loss Coverage: 99.3%
- Cost-to-Income Ratio: 42.1%

LIQUIDITY:
- Liquidity Coverage Ratio (LCR): 152.8%
- Net Stable Funding Ratio (NSFR): 115.2%
- Loan-to-Deposit Ratio: 80.3%

The bank maintains strong capital buffers and healthy liquidity positions, demonstrating robust financial health in Q1 2024.

Kaspi Bank - Q1 2024 Operational Metrics

NETWORK INFRASTRUCTURE:
- Total Branches: 85 locations nationwide
- ATM Network: 425 machines
- Self-Service Terminals: 650
- Employee Count: 1,445 professionals

CLIENT BASE:
- Total Active Clients: 886,121 customers
- Digital Banking Users: 753,202 (85.0% digitalization rate)
- New Clients This Quarter: 41,672
- Corporate Clients: 44,306
- Retail Clients: 841,814

DIGITAL BANKING PERFORMANCE:
- Mobile App Downloads: 877065
- Active Mobile Users: 578,506
- Online Transactions Volume: 9.7 million transactions
- Digital Transaction Share: 81.6% of all transactions
- Average Mobile App Rating: 4.5/5.0

PRODUCT PENETRATION:
- Cards Issued: 1,298,995 total cards
- Credit Cards: 312,734
- Debit Cards: 1,014,926
- Active Loan Accounts: 198,420
- Deposit Accounts: 755,775

EFFICIENCY METRICS:
- Transactions per Employee: 385 per day
- Average Service Time: 4.9 minutes
- Customer Satisfaction Score (NPS): 48
- Employee Productivity Index: 87.3%

Kaspi Bank continues to expand its digital capabilities while maintaining a strong physical presence across Kazakhstan.

Kaspi Bank - Q1 2024 Market Analysis & Strategic Overview

MARKET POSITION:
- Market Share by Assets: 19.26%
- Market Share by Loans: 21.15%
- Market Share by Deposits: 18.51%
- Ranking in Kazakhstan: #2

YEAR-OVER-YEAR COMPARISON:
- Asset Growth YoY: 8.5%
- Loan Portfolio Growth YoY: 19.9%
- Deposit Growth YoY: 9.9%
- Net Profit Growth YoY: 5.4%
- Client Base Growth YoY: 13.5%

COMPETITIVE ADVANTAGES:
- Leading digital banking platform with 90%+ digitalization
- Strong capital position exceeding regulatory requirements
- Diversified loan portfolio across retail and corporate segments
- Advanced risk management systems
- High customer satisfaction and retention rates
- Innovative fintech ecosystem integration

BUSINESS SEGMENTS PERFORMANCE:
Retail Banking:
- Segment Profit: 113.93 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 3218.64 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 4346.26 billion KZT

Corporate Banking:
- Segment Profit: 66.43 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 1589.97 billion KZT
- Customer Deposits: 2497.89 billion KZT

SME Banking:
- Segment Profit: 22.21 billion KZT
- Loans Outstanding: 756.69 billion KZT
- Active SME Clients: 119,750

STRATEGIC INITIATIVES Q1 2024:
- Expansion of digital ecosystem and super-app functionality
- Enhanced cybersecurity and fraud prevention systems
- AI-powered customer service and personalization
- Sustainable finance and ESG integration
- Partnership expansion with fintech companies

RISK MANAGEMENT OVERVIEW:
- Credit Risk: Well-diversified portfolio with prudent underwriting
- Market Risk: Limited exposure, effective hedging strategies
- Operational Risk: Robust controls and business continuity plans
- Compliance: Full adherence to Basel III and local regulations

OUTLOOK:
Kaspi Bank is well-positioned for continued growth in the Kazakhstani banking market, supported by strong fundamentals, 
digital innovation, and commitment to customer value creation.
